author: Reuters Editorial
title: Generic drugmakers to face first charges in U.S. probe - Bbg
text:
U.S. prosecutors were nearing their first charges against generic-drug companies in a nearly four-year-old criminal probe into a possible price-fixing, Bloomberg reported, citing people familiar with the matter.
At least two companies were on track to be charged in the coming months, along with other executives, the report said. ( bloom.bg/2Hoy6MJ ) (Reporting by Anirban Paul in Bengaluru; Editing by Arun Koyyur)
